context: Motorola Solutions continues as a global leader in public safety and enterprise security with solutions in Land Mobile Radio (LMR), Command Center, and Video Security. Q3 2024 revenues were $2.5B with net income of $430M. R&D expenditures increased by 5% in first nine months of 2024. Price-to-earnings ratio of 34.93x.
